name: Boogie's Dark Ritual GB (Jam Version)
description:
It's Boogie's night out on the town! Join them for an unforgettable night of misadventures including (1) minigame!

Small project made for Toronto Game Jam 2021

Made in GB Studio

controls:

z - a

x - b

arrows - d-pad

shift/enter - start/select

credits:

ppixxie -  https://twitter.com/ppixxie (art)

ianbooms - https://twitter.com/ianboomsmusic (sound)

beachboogeyman: https://twitter.com/BeachBoogeyman (art / scripting)
